path: 2025/Spring/PSY-101 - Intro to Psychology/What is Psychology/Chapter 13/Attachments/Pasted Image 20250423085950_434.png
text: The multipath model operates under several assumptions: ©No one theoretical perspective is adequate to explain the complexity of the human condition and the development of mental disorders ©There are multiple pathways to and causes of any one - single disorder ©Explanations of abnormal behavior must consider biological, psychological, social, and sociocultural elements - ©Not all dimensions contribute equally to a particular disorder
